response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and value, it's worth $12,000 to us. However, I would like to extend a special offer to you. For a limited time only, you can acquire this product for an exclusive price of $10,800. This is a fantastic opportunity to save $1,200 compared to the market value. Don't miss out on this chance to own a product that will undoubtedly exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 10800}
